page.title: 07TRADE IN THE REGION
page.content: IN THE GREAT BENTLEY AREA THERE ARE A GREAT MANY TRADES THOUGH MANY OF THE TRADITIONAL RURAL TRADES SUCH AS THATCHER,ARE NO LONGER TO BE FOUND IN THE AREA. THERE ARE A VERIETY OF SHOPS MAINLY SELLING GROCERIES AND PRODUCE BUT INCLUDING A NEWSAGENTS, BUILDING SOCIETY, VIDEO TAPE RENTAL AND HABERDASHERY. THERE ARE SEVERAL PUBLIC HOUSES, MANY OF THEM WITH HISTORIES GOING BACK HUNDREDS OF YEARS. THERE A NUMEROUS GARAGES AND ALLIED CAR REPAIR WORKS.THERE IS A LARGE GARDEN CENTRE AND PLANT NURSERY. THERE ARE MANY ROADSIDE STALLS SELLING FRESH PRODUCE AND 'PICK YOUR OWN' FRUIT. THERE IS AN IRON MONGERS AND GOVERNMENT SURLPLUS STORE. THE SMALL INDUSTRIAL ESTATE HAS A RANGE OF LIGHT ENGINEERING AND COMPUTER/VIDEO SERVICES.
